parts: (a)    how many privately owned nursing schools were operating in Zambia as of 31st August, 2015, province by province;
(b)    what the average pass rate at these institutions is; and

(c)    whether any such schools have been de-registered due to poor performance during the period January, 2013 to August, 2015. W10    Mr Miyutu (Kalabo Central) - to ask the Minister of General Education:
(a)    what the total number of teachers recruited by the Government from 1st January, 2011 to 1st October, 2015, year by year, is;
(b)    what method was used in the recruitment exercise; and

(c)    how many teachers were deployed to each province during the period at (a).
